contract.name: authentify-contract
contract.description: Authentify - Web3 Authentication Layer for Polkadot

docs: Constructor - initializes the contract with default settings
constructors.label: new

docs: Register a new identity (called during user registration)
* `username` - User's chosen username (3-32 chars, alphanumeric + underscore)
* `social_id_hash` - Hash of social identifier (e.g., hash of "google:user@gmail.com")
* `social_provider` - Social provider name (google, github, twitter, etc.)
messages.label: register_identity

docs: Authenticate a user by username and password hash
messages.label: authenticate

docs: Verify password for an account (used by backend for additional checks)
messages.label: verify_password

docs: Create a new session after successful authentication
messages.label: create_session

docs: Verify if a session is valid
messages.label: verify_session

docs: Unlock a locked account (admin only or after timeout)
messages.label: unlock_account

docs: Verify an identity (mark as verified by admin)
messages.label: verify_identity

docs: Get complete identity information for an account
messages.label: get_identity

docs: Get account by social ID hash
messages.label: get_account_by_social

docs: Check if social ID is already bound
messages.label: is_social_id_available

docs: Check if account has registered identity
messages.label: has_identity

docs: Get total number of registered users
messages.label: get_total_users

docs: Transfer admin role to another account
messages.label: transfer_admin
